phrases: You just need to suck it up for another two hours!
Wendy, lay another Troia on the poor guy!
At this rate, Natsu will melt into nothingness before we reach our destination!
The Truly Evil Jiggle Butt Gang!
I will try it once more!
It is not really making a difference...
It is not having any effect!
Usually, he feels better right away...
It can only be one thing...
With the spell cast on him every time he got on some form of transportation...
He is slow on the uptake, though, which is why it worked as long as it did.
There is nothing we can do about it, Natsu.
You will just have to rely on will power alone
to get you through the next two hours.
This time, Natsu and the others have accepted a job from a wealthy person,
their mission to safely escort a great deal of gold by freight
The trip takes six hours from Magnolia, heading due west across the continent.
Thus far, four hours have passed without incident,
but Natsu and the rest had no way of knowing
that a terrible evil was silently creeping towards them...
You two better get fired up!
For we are the notorious robbers...
Right now, we are about to embark on
Operation: Steal the Gold Cargo from the Freight Train and Good Riddance!
Just one more step to the treasure.
What is he doing in there?!
True evil does not revise its plans!
At a time like this, true evil gets crafty!
While I distract that guy, you scout out the freight car!
What is wrong, laddy, you got motion sickness?!
I do not know who you are, but I feel a little better now.
Worrying about a complete stranger, old man...
That makes you a good guy in my book...
Compared to the jerks in there, who accepted this job
even though they knew I would get motion sickness...
What kind of job is that?
So your comrades are bodyguards, eh?
We can sneak a peek through here.
Do not worry about it, Wendy!
it takes a long time for her to snap out of it.
And Natsu knew he would get sick on this job,
so maybe he should not have signed on from the start.
You are right, but he seemed to have nothing else going on...
Still, for magic not to work at a time when it is really needed,
that makes me a failure as a wizard.
That is taking it too far!
I know how you feel, laddy.
It is tough when things do not work out smoothly with your colleagues...
Even more so when you are the leader!
You understand my viewpoint, old man?!
Hey, you going to be okay?!
You scared the crap out of me!
It turns out they are wizards!
They have all got this mark!
Then they are in a guild, eh?
That is a bit of a nuisance.
I am all out of stuff to throw up!
They are nice guys too, so they came to look after you!
When someone is in need, it is not in their nature to look the other way.
Do not throw in the towel, laddy!
Us good guys are behind you all the way!
I wonder if he feels better...
He is dense, so maybe it just took time for the magic to take effect.
Um... M-May I ask who you are?
Only authorized people are allowed in here...
The thing is, we found this young man lying unconscious out there...
This is more serious than I thought!
Unless you do not care what happens to this girl?!
Oh, Boss, you are so cool!
Do not tell me you guys are after this freight...
And we are not afraid of any wizards!
And Natsu's totally out of it...
Hey, you three... what are you doing?!
I think I am going to throw up...
The Jiggle Butt Gang has commandeered this cargo!
And I think we will have all of you jump out of the train!
Like any of us would obey an order from villains like you!
Are you in any position to talk like that?!
I swear we will save you!
Your appearance is not the only thing that is dirty!
You going to jump off the train or not?!
Let us go, Secret Jiggle Butt Art!
The stink is permeating my clothes!
You would let yourself die like this?!
I cannot focus my strength with that odor lingering in my nose!
It sends a shock to the raging heart of this evil robber...
Lackey A, Lackey B, get up!
Have you ever seen such a thing?!
Our truly evil plans are getting off track!
You need to get fired up again!
That is kind of a half-assed number!
I am sure everyone is okay.
Now it is up to me to protect the gold!
What do you intend to do next?
We are just here for the gold.
Unless you can protect it all on your own, little lady?
You are still useful to us as hostages!
And if you try meddling with our plans,
what do you think's going to happen to him?
We are done with the push-ups...
This are not no time to relax!
Now the gold belongs to the Jiggle Butt Gang!
Wave two of Gas-Butt Triple Ecstasy!
We are going after them, you two!
Well, the inside of my nose is clean now, so...
Nothing is impossible for the Jiggle Butt Gang!
But the train will soon stop, will not it?
Are you going to fire off a round of gas every time it does?
On top of that, it does not look like you brought along any equipment,
so how are you going to carry the freight away?
There is no way you neglected to think about that, right?
What are we going to do, Boss?!
Did you really think I had not planned for this?!
With our muscles, there is not anything we cannot... do...
We are going to rely on my leg muscles!
I just hope it relieves at least a little of your pain...
All of a sudden, the pain disappearing!
This girl is no ordinary girl, huh?
But y'know, if you have got that kind of power, you oughta use it on him, too.
I do have a spell for motion sickness,
but I used it so much on him that it is stopped working altogether...
I have got to become a higher-level wizard...
You have got it rough, huh, Miss?
Everyone in Fairy Tail is really nice.
I am happy that I joined the guild.
She is bravely holding back her tears!
You know, I do not really see you as being all that bad.
but there is no worse insult than saying those words to the truly evil!
Listen, when you are truly evil...
Is not it more important for you to figure out how to carry the cargo away?
The girl has a good point.
How are we going to carry the gold?
Recently, my butt's starting to sag...
I have to be sharp here...
What would Natsu-san and Lucy-san do at a time like this?
If you really want gold that badly,
I will negotiate on your behalf with our client
to try to get him to share a little bit with you.
In exchange, I want you to make a promise.
That you will never do something bad like this again...
That is kind of a tall order...
Fine, then give up on the gold.
If you make me that promise, I will get this freight car moving.
You are able to do that?!
Seeing your gas propulsion method gave me an idea.
You are going to do Gas-Butt Ecstasy?!
Alright, we will go along with your idea, young lady.
Listen, we will just pretend to cooperate with her.
The truly evil cannot be satisfied with just a smidgen of gold!
We will put her at ease and then, as soon as we have our chance,
The truly evil do not think like the common herd, huh?
Okay, young lady, would you get this train going?
How is she going to do it without using Gas-Butt?
But little as she is, she is a wizard with a guild mark.
She can probably let loose with powerful magic...
Show us what you have got.
I think we will be able to make up for lost time in one shot.
Miss, do you happen to be... one of them Dragon Slayers?
Please let us call you Lady Boss!
It is the first time we have ever met someone with this much power!
Please join the Jiggle Butt Gang...
No, let us call you our goddess!
After that, we will follow you anywhere!
I am the one who should say, Ehhh!
Are you serious about making her our goddess?!
I am as serious as serious can get...
Look, with the powerful magic she can wield,
the best thing for us to do is get her on our side!
We will use this golden opportunity to gain a strong ally!
I guess I have no choice but pretend to be on their side for now...
I have to do my best here!
I am the only one who can protect the gold!
In other words, our plan is going to be to...
This is my finest moment of being with the Jiggle Butt Gang!
Then you have agreed to become our goddess?!
In that case, we start with this pose!
What kind of cosplay is that?
What is the story with that outfit?
What have you done to Wendy?!
And if it is bad, I will bite through your windpipes!
Why are they listening to Wendy?
And what do they mean by goddess?
Give up on being truly evil and turn over a new leaf.
Why do not you study to become wizards?
Fairy Tail offers a correspondence course.
How about sending away for the materials?
You are thinking about our welfare that much?
Now that you mention it, we never thought about...
She ends up soothing even the worst of evil criminals...
It is Wendy's style to go that far.
Wendy, the bad guys are threatening you, right?
That is not what is going on, Happy!
You acted all nice to me... because you are thieves, yeah?
I am in the middle of convincing them!
I do not think they are really that bad...
Why did you make me wait so long?!
We had a little trouble along the way...
After that, you got sick all over again, huh?
Anyway, you will be paid half the agreed-upon fee!
Now's the time to work your magic!
Go and sooth this guy's heart!
I will never forgive that Gas-Butt Brigade!
The Jiggle Butt Gang never gives up!
We are going to keep going full speed ahead'til we master true evil!
Second star to the right, and straight on to true evil!
It is against the rules to turn invisible!
You are looking the wrong way!
Next time: The Terror of Invisible Lucy!
I do not think that would work for you, Happy.
Once in a while, I want to be in the spotlight, too!
That is a really sad reason...
